restrict_dependent_destroy.has_many: Cannot delete record because dependent %{record} exist
restrict_dependent_destroy.has_one: Cannot delete record because a dependent %{record} exists

currency.cannot_change_after_creation: cannot be changed. Please create a new profile for the currency

user.owner_self_share: is already the owner of the profile

base.cannot_change_after_cancelled: This reconciliation has been cancelled. Further changes to it are not possible
base.cannot_change_after_finished: This reconciliation is already finished. Further changes to it are not possible
base.cannot_have_transactions_with_no_wallets: This reconciliation cannot be completed because there are transactions within the reconciliation period that have unspecified wallets. Assign wallets to all transactions and try again.
base.cannot_have_two_reconciliations_in_progr: There is already a reconciliation in progress. A new reconciliation process cannot be started until the existing one is either finished or cancelled

date.cannot_be_older_than_finished_reconcilia: has to be newer than the date from the last finished reconciliation
date.cannot_finish_date_in_future: cannot be a date in the future when finishing a reconciliation

balance_amount_cents.cannot_change_on_completed_reconciliatio: cannot be changed after reconciliation is finished or cancelled

base.cannot_alter_prior_to_reconciliation: Cannot create, edit, or delete any transactions prior to %{date}, the date of the latest reconciliation

base.cannot_disable_with_nonzero_balance: Cannot be disabled because wallet has remaining balance. Wallet balance must be zero before it can be disabled. This can be done by either creating a transaction, or completing a reconciliation where the resulting wallet balance is zero.

confirmations.confirmed: Your email address has been successfully confirmed. You can now log in.
confirmations.send_instructions: You will receive an email with instructions for how to confirm your email address in a few minutes.
confirmations.send_paranoid_instructions: If your email address exists in our database, you will receive an email with instructions for how to confirm your email address in a few minutes.

failure.inactive: Your account is not activated yet.
failure.last_attempt: You have one more attempt before your account is locked.
failure.timeout: Your session expired. Please sign in again to continue.
failure.unauthenticated: You need to sign in or sign up before continuing.
failure.unconfirmed: You have to confirm your email address before continuing.

omniauth_callbacks.failure: Could not authenticate you from %{kind} because "%{reason}".

passwords.no_token: You can't access this page without coming from a password reset email. If you do come from a password reset email, please make sure you used the full URL provided.
passwords.send_instructions: You will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password in a few minutes.
passwords.send_paranoid_instructions: If your email address exists in our database, you will receive a password recovery link at your email address in a few minutes.
passwords.updated: Your password has been changed successfully. You are now signed in.
passwords.updated_not_active: Your password has been changed successfully.

registrations.destroyed: Bye! Your account has been successfully cancelled. We hope to see you again soon.
registrations.signed_up: Welcome! You have signed up successfully.
registrations.signed_up_but_inactive: You have signed up successfully. However, we could not sign you in because your account is not yet activated.
registrations.signed_up_but_locked: You have signed up successfully. However, we could not sign you in because your account is locked.
registrations.signed_up_but_unconfirmed: A message with a confirmation link has been sent to your email address. Please follow the link to activate your account.
registrations.update_needs_confirmation: You updated your account successfully, but we need to verify your new email address. Please check your email and follow the confirmation link to confirm your new email address.
registrations.updated: Your account has been updated successfully.
registrations.updated_but_not_signed_in: Your account has been updated successfully, but since your password was changed, you need to sign in again.

unlocks.send_instructions: You will receive an email with instructions for how to unlock your account in a few minutes.
unlocks.send_paranoid_instructions: If your account exists, you will receive an email with instructions for how to unlock it in a few minutes.
unlocks.unlocked: Your account has been unlocked successfully. Please sign in to continue.

errors.connection_refused:
Oops! Failed to connect to the Web Console middleware.
Please make sure a rails development server is running.

messages.already_confirmed: was already confirmed, please try signing in
messages.confirmation_period_expired: needs to be confirmed within %{period}, please request a new one
messages.expired: has expired, please request a new one
messages.greater_than_or_equal_to: must be greater than or equal to %{count}
messages.inclusion: is not included in the list
messages.invalid_currency: has invalid format (must be '100', '5%{decimal}24', or '123%{thousands}456%{decimal}78'). Got %{currency}
messages.less_than_or_equal_to: must be less than or equal to %{count}

not_saved.one: 1 error prohibited this %{resource} from being saved:
not_saved.other: %{count} errors prohibited this %{resource} from being saved:

wrong_length.one: is the wrong length (should be 1 character)
wrong_length.other: is the wrong length (should be %{count} characters)

errors.unacceptable_request: A supported version is expected in the Accept header.
errors.unavailable_session:
Session %{id} is no longer available in memory.

If you happen to run on a multi-process server (like Unicorn or Puma) the process
this request hit doesn't store %{id} in memory. Consider turning the number of
processes/workers to one (1) or using a different server in development.

create.error: There was an error sending the invite to share the profile "%{profile_name}" with "%{invitee}": %{error}
create.success: Your invite to share the profile "%{profile_name}" was successfully sent to "%{invitee}"!

profile_share_invite_sent.invite_paragraph: %{inviter} has invited you to share their Finance Micromanager profile "%{profile_name}". This will allow you to view and manage the profile, create transactions, view reports and statistics data, and much more. To accept, click the link below or copy/paste it directly in your browser.
profile_share_invite_sent.new_profile_paragraph: Ops, it looks like you don't yet have an account with Finance Micromanager. You will need to sign up for one before accepting the invite. Click the link below or copy/paste it directly in your browser to do that.
profile_share_invite_sent.subject: You got an invite from %{inviter}!

create.error: Reconciliation for %{date} could not be started: %{error}

destroy.error: Reconciliation for %{date} could not be cancelled: %{error}

finish.error: Reconciliation for %{date} could not be finalised: %{error}
finish.success_with_correction: Reconciliation for %{date} has been successfully finalised. A balance difference of %{balance_difference} was detected, and a correction transaction was created for %{date} to correct the profile's balance with the amount reported.
finish.success_without_correction: Reconciliation for %{date} has been successfully finalised. No balance difference was detected.

update.error: Reconciliation for %{date} could not be updated: %{error}

create.error: Wallet balance could not be updated: %{error}
create.not_found: Wallet balance could not be updated because a record could not be found. Please try again.

update.error: There was an error updating your profile info.

index.delete_confirmation: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.
index.name: Name
index.title: Categories

rails.delete_confirmation: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.
rails.disable_confirmation: Are you sure? You can re-enable this in the future.
rails.generic_error: An unexpected error has occurred. Please reload the page and try again.

index.pending_invite_text_accepted: You have accepted the invite from %{inviter} to share their profile "%{profile_name}". You can now to view and manage transactions, categories, and all other aspects associated with the profile.
index.pending_invite_text_pending: %{inviter} has invited you to share their profile "%{profile_name}". A shared profile means you both will be able to view and manage transactions, categories, and all other aspects associated with the profile.
index.pending_invite_text_rejected: You have declined the invite from %{inviter} to share their profile "%{profile_name}". You will not have access to their profile, but they will be able to invite you again.
index.sent_invite_text_cancelled: The invite has been cancelled. The recipient can no longer accept it.
index.sent_invite_text_pending: The invite was sent, but the recipient has not yet replied.

modal.invitee_email_label: Who do you want to share this profile with?
modal.shared_warning_message: This profile was shared with you by %{name}. Please take care when sharing it with others.
modal.title: Share Profile

form.currency_change_warning: Currency cannot be changed after profile is created!

index.confirm_cancel_message: Are you sure you want to cancel the reconciliation? This cannot be undone.
index.confirm_finish_message: Are you sure you want to finish the reconciliation? This cannot be undone.
index.confirm_finish_message_with_balance: Are you sure you want to finish the reconciliation? This cannot be undone. This will create a balance correction transaction of %{amount} on %{date}.
index.title: Reconciliations

info_alert.message: There is a reconciliation in progress for %{date}. Click here to access it.

show.calculated_balance_info_text: This balance was calculated by summing the amounts from all transaction since the last reconciliation, or since the start, if this is the first reconciliation.
show.real_balance_info_text: This should reflect the actual balance on the wallet at the end of the day on the reconciliation date. This is usually done by counting how much cash there is, or checking the balance in a bank account, for instance.
show.title: Reconciliation for %{date}
show.unspecified_balance_cannot_be_edited: Unspecified balance refers to the balance sum of transactions which do not have a wallet specified. Before finishing this reconciliation, all transactions must have their wallets set and this balance must be reduced to zero.

index.delete_confirmation: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.
index.name: Name
index.no_transactions: There are no transactions to show.
index.title: Transactions
